string-array.name: diag_help_suggestions
string-array.item: Check if all the devices are in same network.
Check wi-fi is enabled in all the devices.
Check the CommunicationTest Activity is started on other devices.(When the config changes, you need to manually start it).
Check if the devices are sufficiently charged.(Some devices stop communicating if the battery level is below certain level).
If still the communication does not happen, contact the platform team.
